Hacker Journey

Hello I'm Aman Thakur

Hey I'm Aman Thakur. I am a front end developer and love working with WordPress and modern JS. I blog about my coding adventures here.

I initially started my career as a marketer and then switched to developer when exposed to programming. Because of my initial career, I am also very keen to develop apps that are conversion-friendly, fast and rank well in search engines.
